about_the_game:
Welcome to Mythical Ruins, an epic adventure brought to life in the Unreal Engine! Plunge into a world full of secrets and challenges, without the hassle of quests or tedious reading. It's all about exploring the world on your own, fighting a variety of enemies and surviving in different biomes.

Experience a Soulslike experience where you can constantly improve your skills as you fight your way through the mystical ruins. Venture into the hardcore area for even more intense challenges or explore the different biomes and discover their secrets.

Prepare yourself for an adventure full of excitement, tactics and unforgettable battles in Mythical Ruins. Are you ready to push your limits and discover the legends of this forgotten world?

content_descriptors.notes:
There are sword fights against animals and monsters
There is the killing of animals and monsters, but without blood and without mutilation.
There is no other violence
There are no sexual scenes
No alcohol
No drugs

  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon RX 570 mit 4GB VRAM
